snippet.title: Winding Up To Chopin @ 200
snippet.description:
Winding Up To Chopin @ 200
25 Sep 2009 by pieces of moments on pieces of moments piecesofmoments.wordpress.com/2009/09/24/winding-up-to-chopin-200/
… next year is 200th anniversary of Chopin's birth. So, articles and rumblings of documentaries are beginning … three bars of music ever are Chopin (50-52) from his Ballade No. 4 in F Minor (3:09-3:15 on the clock of "part 1" below if … now, because one cannot possibly get enough Krystian Zimerman, here he is (again) performing the music of his countryman, Chopin …
